title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 28.10 - Release of principal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 28.10 - Release of principal

State Regulations
A bail agent shall obtain the prompt release of a principal following execution of an indemnity agreement or bail agreement. Prompt release includes securing a release order from the court and effectuating a principal's actual release from custody. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
